name: Cliché Dungeon
description:
It is heavily recommend that you play in fullscreen

Welcome to Cliché Dungeon, a roguelite experiment where every aspect is directly based on a cliché. You play as Fall Guy, gun in hand, facing a procedurally generated dungeon filled with monsters. Grab loot, get new weapons, and fight your way to victory.

Made for the Github Game Off 2022 Jam

The Source code can be found at https://github.com/DiogoMendonc-a/GameOff/

Instructions
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Pointing
  • Left Mouse Button - Shooting
  • Space Bar - Dash
  • E - Interact

You can only carry one weapon at a time, picking up another will delete the one you have.

You can have as many items as you want.

The Team
  • Diogo Mendonça - Programming and some sprite work
  • José Cutileiro - Programming and most pixel art
  • Rómulo Kaidussis - Programming

We are part of Game Dev Técnico, a college group of students with a passion for making games. You can find us in our website and our itch page

Music taken from https://www.ashamaluevmusic.com/
